feed.title: Windhawk Mod Updates
feed.subtitle: Updates in the official collection of Windhawk mods

entry.title: Icons of Win16 apps in Explorer 1.0
entry.content: Adds support for icons of 16-bit (Win16) executables in File Explorer (such as Civilization I). The mod is adapted from Icon16bitFix utility.

entry.title: Classic Taskbar 3D buttons Lite 1.2
entry.content:
Classic Taskbar 3D buttons

Lightweight mod which restores 3D buttons on taskbar when using Windows Classic theme. The idea is based on the mod by Aubymori (https://github.com/aubymori).

Before:

After:

entry.title: Taskbar notification icon spacing 1.0.1
entry.content: • Fixed a possible crash on explorer start.

entry.title: Windows 11 Start Menu Styler 1.0.2
entry.content: • Fixed styles not applying on system startup.

entry.title: Fake High Contrast 1.0.0
entry.content:
Fake High Contrast

  • Makes applications think as if high contrast mode is enabled (disabled), even if it's not.
  • Useful if you want more applications to follow your Win32 msstyles / classic schemes. Even UWP apps!

Known issues

  • UIRibbon is not affected at all.

entry.title: Bring Back the Borders! 1.1.0
entry.content:
Bring back the borders!

A simple mod to restore borders and corners in Windows 11.

Based on the Disable rounded corners in Windows 11 project by m417z.

Based on the Win11DisableRoundedCorners project by Valentin Radu.

⚠ Important usage note ⚠

In order to use this mod, you must allow Windhawk to inject into the dwm.exe system process. To do so, add it to the process inclusion list in the advanced settings. If you do not do this, it will silently fail to inject.

entry.title: Classic Theme Explorer Lite 1.1
entry.content: Fixes https://github.com/ramensoftware/windhawk-mods/issues/510

entry.title: Classic Theme Explorer Lite 1.0.2
entry.content: More compact and remove intermediate variables

entry.title: Classic Theme Explorer Lite 1.0.1
entry.content: Remove unneeded code

entry.title: Classic Theme Explorer Lite 1.0
entry.content: Classic theme fixes for Windows 10 taskbar (when running on either Windows 10 or Windows 11)

entry.title: Click on empty taskbar space 1.3
entry.content:
Features:

  • added option to control "Combine Taskbar buttons" feature on secondary taskbars
  • added feature to send custom key press
  • added feature to run arbitrary command/process

Dev:

  • implemented file logger in order to capture log after fresh Windows start (and debug hook) or to capture crashes
  • implemented trace logger to log method entry/exit to debug execution order
  • implemented logging levels to make stuff really verbose if needed

entry.title: Enable SyslistView32 1.0.2
entry.content: descriptions should be on separate lines

entry.title: Enable SyslistView32 1.0.1
entry.content: Add descriptions to images

entry.title: Enable Classic Theme by handle method 1.0.1
entry.content: Fix links

entry.title: Fix browsers for Windows Classic theme 1.0
entry.content: This mod forces Aero Lite window borders on browsers MS Edge, Chrome, Chromium and Steam app, which fixes their glitches when using Windows Classic theme.

entry.title: Classic UWP Fix 0.2
entry.content:
Classic UWP Fix

This mod fixes UWP apps getting stuck at the splash screen when using the Classic theme.

No more need to run ApplicationFrameHost before enabling Classic!

This works by hardcoding the splash fade animation values instead of fetching them from msstyles.

entry.title: Enable Classic Theme by handle method 1.0
entry.content:
Disables visual styles, effectively enabling the Windows Classic theme. This mod uses the method of closing access to the memory area where the theme is located. It is one of the multiple methods of enabling Windows Classic theme.

The mod injects only in the process Winlogon.exe, and exits once the handle of the memory area is closed. It does not hook any functions.

Make sure that the option allowing injecting into critical system processes is enabled in Windhawk options.

The mod affects only windows that are shown after enabling the mod.

Windows Classic theme is not compatible with Windows 10 Task Manager. Before enabling the mode, install the classic task manager: https://winaero.com/get-classic-old-task-manager-in-windows-10/

Enabling the mod will make UWP apps unfunctional. Install a mod that fixes this, for instance, this one: https://winclassic.boards.net/thread/2058/classic-uwp-fix

Windows Classic theme is not compatible with Windows 11 and Windows 10 taskbars out of the box. It is recommended to use Explorer Patcher (https://github.com/valinet/ExplorerPatcher) utility, which includes the necessary fixes.

entry.title: Enable SyslistView32 1.0
entry.content: Enables the SysListView32 control in File Explorer folder windows. This makes the view more compact and allows icon rearrangement. SysListView32 control has been used by default before Windows 7.

entry.title: Taskbar notification icon spacing 1.0
entry.content:
Taskbar notification icon spacing

Reduce or increase the spacing between notification (tray) icons on the taskbar.

Only Windows 11 version 22H2 or newer is currently supported. For older Windows versions check out 7+ Taskbar Tweaker.


Notification icon width: 32 (Windows 11 default)


Notification icon width: 24


Notification icon width: 18

entry.title: Classic Explorer navigation bar 1.0.1
entry.content: • Reimplemented the Classic ribbon UI (no tabs) option to work with the new KB5034204 update.
